about.metaDescription: Learn about DevLovers - the platform for technical interview preparation

hero.description: Stop guessing. We decoded the chaotic interview process into a structured roadmap.
hero.descriptionRest: into a production-ready skillset and land that offer

topics.description: From frontend frameworks to backend logic. We cover the key technologies for 2026.

features.title: Features designed to
features.subtitle: Stop searching for scattered info. We curated the ultimate toolkit to crack technical interviews.

qa.title: Q&A
qa.description: No fluff. Just a massive library of real interview questions with precise, recruiter-approved answers.

quiz.title: Quizzes
quiz.description: Validate your confidence. Fast-paced interactive quizzes to spot your weak points before the interviewer does.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Gamify your prep. Earn points for every correct answer, keep your streak alive, and rank up against others.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Stay updated with detailed articles on tech trends, coding tutorials, and industry insights to keep you ahead of the curve.

profile.title: Analytics
profile.description: Don't fly blind. Visualize your progress with detailed charts to see exactly which topics you've mastered.

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Upgrade your setup. High-quality developer apparel, desk accessories, and digital assets available for purchase.

pricing.heading: Pricing
pricing.title: Invest in your brain,
pricing.subtitle: We believe knowledge should be accessible. So we don't sell courses. But servers heat up and coffee runs out. The choice is yours.

junior.title: Junior Engineer
junior.description: For those who want an offer, not expenses.

hero.title: Open Source Hero
hero.description: For those who already landed an offer thanks to us.

pricing.disclaimer: *No developers were harmed in the making of this pricing table. Only caffeine levels were impacted.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how DevLovers collects, uses, and protects your personal data.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

whoWeAre.title: 1. Who we are
whoWeAre.content: DevLovers is a platform for technical interview preparation. If you have questions about this policy, contact us at

dataWeCollect.title: 2. What data we collect
dataWeCollect.accountDataDesc: email, username, authentication identifiers, and related security metadata.
dataWeCollect.usageDataDesc: interactions with quizzes, results, progress, and basic telemetry needed to improve the service.
dataWeCollect.technicalDataDesc: device/browser information, IP address, logs, and error reports.

whyWeCollect.title: 3. Why we collect data
whyWeCollect.reason1: To provide and secure authorization and account access.
whyWeCollect.reason2: To run quizzes, store results, and show progress/leaderboards.
whyWeCollect.reason3: To improve performance, reliability, and user experience.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and similar technologies
cookies.content: We may use cookies/local storage to keep you signed in, store preferences (e.g. theme), and protect the service. If we add analytics cookies, we will update this section.

sharing.title: 5. Sharing of data
sharing.content: We do not sell personal data. We may share limited data with trusted service providers (e.g. hosting, database, error monitoring) strictly to operate DevLovers.

retention.title: 6. Data retention
retention.content: We keep personal data only as long as needed for the purposes described above or as required by law.

rights.title: 7. Your rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights to access, correct, delete, or export your data. Contact us at

gdpr.title: 8. GDPR compliance (EU users)
gdpr.intro: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), you have additional rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
gdpr.rightAccessDesc: You can request a copy of your personal data.
gdpr.rightRectificationDesc: You can request correction of inaccurate data.
gdpr.rightErasureDesc: You can request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten").
gdpr.rightRestrictionDesc: You can request limited processing of your data.
gdpr.rightPortabilityDesc: You can request your data in a machine-readable format.
gdpr.rightObjectDesc: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests.
gdpr.exerciseRights: To exercise these rights, contact us at

changes.title: 9. Changes to this policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy. The latest version will always be available on this page.

terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using the DevLovers platform.
terms.title: Terms of Service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using DevLovers, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and authorization
accounts.content: When authorization is enabled, you may need an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activity under your account.

features.title: 3. Service features
features.feature1: Q&A content and interview preparation materials

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited use
prohibited.item1: Attempting to hack, disrupt, or bypass security/authentication mechanisms.
prohibited.item2: Scraping content at scale without permission.

ip.title: 5. Intellectual property
ip.content: DevLovers and its content are protected by applicable intellectual property laws. You may not copy, distribute, or reuse content beyond what is permitted for normal usage of the service.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: DevLovers is provided "as is" without warranties. We do not guarantee that using the platform will result in employment.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DevLovers shall not be liable for indirect or consequential damages.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate access if we reasonably believe you violated these Terms or abused the service.

changes.title: 9. Changes to terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. The latest version will always be available on this page.
